name: Megabite (Astrobit, normanlista, MagicDylen)
description:
Move: <^>       Attack: Z      Activate: X

Switch between playing as an AI and a Panda Bear to escape prison.

Mega The AI, a devastating artificial intelligence is trapped in a high-security prison.

Bite The Panda, can be possessed by the evil AI To escape. He is pretty dumb...

Be careful, if you let the panda die, you won´t get out of the prison. He is your only way out.

Switch from Mega to Bite to activate Turrets and Open Gates

While you are moving through the cables as Mega The AI, your Vehicle Panda will just randomly walk and probably kill himself

But as soon as it touches a Terminal, you will return to control its body!
Hurry up before you go back to controlling the Panda!

When you play as Bite The Panda , you can kill all the enemies slashing pressing Z



In order to break out of prison, you need to prepare the path for your panda. Play and think as Mega using the wires to close/open gates, activate turrets and more.
